name: Easy Corn Salad - Great Side for BBQs
author: experimentalcook
summary: This recipe combines canned items with fresh items, so it's really quick to prepare and tastes very fresh. Perfect for summer! The amounts indicated below are what I use when I make a big batch for barbeques, so I suggest cutting down for a family-size portion. Refrigerate for extra cool freshness! Keeps well in refrigerator.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®)
1 (15.25 ounce) can yellow and white corn, drained
2 (11 ounce) cans white corn with chipotle peppers
1 large seedless cucumber, peeled and diced
¼ cup diced red onion, or more to taste
directions: Mix tomatoes with green chile peppers, Mexican-style corn, yellow and white corn, white corn with chipotle peppers, cucumber, red bell peppers, cilantro, red onion, and lime juice together in a large bowl
